trans-unit.source: Defines the identity permission for the URL from which the code originates.
trans-unit.target: 为代码的来源 URL 定义标识权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file.
trans-unit.target: 被视为完整的 URL，包括协议 （HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP） 和文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
trans-unit.target: 例如，http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是完整 URL。

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.
trans-unit.target: Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*。

trans-unit.source: URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是 http:// 的子集\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效的这是调用程序集是完全受信任时如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以防止对系统资源的受信任的代码的意外访问。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由程序集的授予权限来决定。

trans-unit.source: To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并将其分配仅对允许代码访问的资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`权限。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。

trans-unit.source: This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>接口。

trans-unit.source: That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: A URL or wildcard expression.
trans-unit.target: URL 或通配符表达式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> class to represent the URL identity described by <paramref name="site" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> 类的新实例，以表示 <paramref name="site" /> 描述的 URL 标识。

trans-unit.source: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 都视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和该文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.
trans-unit.target: Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*。

trans-unit.source: URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter.
trans-unit.target: Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是 http:// 的子集\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, for performance reasons, an invalid URL does not cause an argument exception at the time the new class instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版中，出于性能原因，一个无效的 URL 不会导致创建新的类实例时出现参数异常。

trans-unit.source: The argument exception will occur when one of the set operations (Union, Intersect, or IsSubsetOf) is executed.
trans-unit.target: 集运算 （Union、 Intersect 或 IsSubsetOf） 之一执行时，将出现参数异常。

trans-unit.source: A demand on the permission causes <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> to be called by the security infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 有关权限原因需<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>由安全基础结构调用。

trans-unit.source: The demand will fail because of the argument exception, resulting in a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 该请求将失败由于出现参数异常，导致<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the original <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will not be seen.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，原始<xref:System.ArgumentException>异常不会被发现。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="site" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="site" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of the <paramref name="site" /> parameter is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="site" /> 参数的长度为零。

trans-unit.source: The URL, directory, or site portion of the <paramref name="site" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="site" /> 参数的 URL、目录或者站点部分无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 与原始权限情况下，一份权限表示对资源的相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数不是有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数的版本号无效。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes access to the URLs they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是介绍访问它们都共同点描述的 Url 的权限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。

trans-unit.source: For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm and a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/* is a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
trans-unit.target: 例如的交集的权限表示对访问http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm和表示访问的权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/* 是表示对访问权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> supports set operations (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission object or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("*").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> 支持 set 操作 (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) 仅当当前权限与指定的权限的对象相等或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("*")。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The Url property is not a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 此 Url 属性不是有效的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission identifies access to a URL that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限标识到完全包含在指定权限的 URL 的访问，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a subset of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/*.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示对访问的权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是表示对访问权限的子集http://www.fourthcoffee.com/*。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> supports set operations (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("*").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> 支持 set 操作 (<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) 仅当当前权限等同于指定的权限或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("*")。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The Url property is not a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 此 Url 属性不是有效的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 权限的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A> method is a permission that represents access to the URL as represented by the current permission, as well as access to the URL as represented by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>方法是表示对由当前的权限，表示 URL 的访问，以及所表示的指定权限的 URL 访问的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> class supports set operations <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission, or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("*") and one is a subset of the other.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission>类支持的集运算<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Intersect%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Union%2A>) 仅当当前权限是否等于指定的权限，或当权限之一使用通配符运算符 ("*") 和一个是的子集其他。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Url" /> property is not a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission.Url" /> 属性不是有效的 URL。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The two permissions are not equal and one is not a subset of the other.
trans-unit.target: 两个权限不相等，而且其中一个不是另一个的子集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL representing the identity of Internet code.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示 Internet 代码的标识的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A URL representing the identity of Internet code.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Internet 代码的标识的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/.
trans-unit.target: 都视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和该文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.
trans-unit.target: Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*。

trans-unit.source: The URL cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.
trans-unit.target: 无法检索 URL，因为它的标识不明确。
